Text: Thank You so much for this. You are about to make my day er.. week. Will seed till seeders count hits 50..

This needs to be normalized to 93db or lower to sound good, even then, it's pretty rough.  Publishers need to stop mastering at such high volumes, it ruins the quality of otherwise excellent music.

On the beginning of Judas Rising, there are so many artifacts that it's almost painful, even after reducing the volume to remove clipping.  After finishing this review, I will be ordering the real thing, so I will be able to compare the quality to see if the CD is this bad.  At least it's not as bad as Death Magnetic...

Having been a fan since Jugulator, I've been waiting to hear Halford sing some of the newer stuff, and it's finally here.
